message: Evidently, a LOT of people don't know what """"race"""" has to do with this topic. I don't either! *laughs* They're reading this portion of my statement above, """"How dare you come into this discussion with YOUR black history and run down this woman who quit a very hard drug, a drug more addictive than Meth, Marijuana, and alcohol combined."""" Ok. First of all, the word black has multiple meanings, but what it shouldn't mean is African American, dark brown skin, or a reference to a breed of humans to more educated individuals. I understand Internet being on cell phones and Facebook opening up to the public means sometimes I need to take things down a level. synonyms for the word black in the context utilized above. Main Entry: black Part of Speech: adjective Definition: hopeless Synonyms: atrocious, bleak, depressing, depressive, dismal, dispiriting, distressing, doleful, dreary, foreboding, funereal, gloomy, horrible, lugubrious, mournful, ominous, oppressive, sad, sinister, sombre, threatening Antonyms: hopeful, optimistic Main Entry: black Part of Speech: adjective Definition: dirty Synonyms: dingy, filthy, foul, grimy, grubby, impure, nasty, soiled, sooty, spotted, squalid, stained, unclean, uncleanly Antonyms: clean Main Entry: black Part of Speech: adjective Definition: angry Synonyms: enraged, fierce, furious, hostile, menacing, resentful, sour, sullen, threatening Antonyms: happy Main Entry: black Part of Speech: adjective Definition: evil Synonyms: bad, diabolical, iniquitous, mean, nefarious, villainous, wicked Antonyms: good Main Entry: bleak Part of Speech: adjective Definition: depressing Synonyms: black, cheerless, comfortless, dark, discouraging, disheartening, dismal, drear, dreary, funereal, gloomy, grim, hard, harsh, hopeless, joyless, lonely, melancholy, mournful, oppressive, sad, somber, unpromising Antonyms: cheerful, comforting, congenial, encouraging, nice, pleasant

The bottom line is the Republican people have spoken for Trump. To try and replace the people's choice will destroy the Republican Party as we know it. Plus, I for one, will cross parties to make sure the Republican Establishment fail.

Bad cops have been killing kids for decades. They just got caught on video doing it. They want the judgement to be deemed reasonable because it means they are unaccountable. I don't know how either officer can hold their head up after murdering a child like that. Sorry but there are bad cops.
Affirmative action now applied in Congress?
Wish they would kidnap him and cut his head off!!!

I'm tired of watching the figureheads of the so called 'Party of Responsibility' squirm out of taking responsibility for anything. A man who raises his hand against a woman wasn't raised to respect women. It has nothing to do with PTSD or anything else. And if he had emotional problems, what the fuck is he doing with access to an AR15? It's so easy for these fools to deflect attention away from their own failings by pointing at Obama or whomever else they want to blame. Deflection won't make the truth go away. Palin is a crappy mother. Her daughter is a duplicitous ho-bag, her son is a nasty, entitled, bad tempered piece of shit that gets in trouble with the law because he has had no discipline or accountability. And Sarah Palin is as dumb as a sack of rocks.

well be pissed off then. At least I'm not playing golf like my president. See, I don't have access to school supplies. I just told you I am struggling myself. What I do have is food. Grown by me, canned by me and raised by me. I have fabric and yarn and the skill to create something from my stash. But... I could ask you that same question. What have you done for the flood victims, the horrible situation in the east or EVEN in your own backyard? I know, you can bitch at me because I retain a voice and an opinion that's not PC correct. Your attitude is what is pissing people off. Some of us are sick of bleeding hearts that can't wipe their own butt let alone some one else's. People like you is what is causing division in our country and unfortunately that division and sick of PC feeling is what is driving this election.
